Html:
I can't find the relative stat values on the drop down. Is it missing, or has it been moved to some other location? It's there when I check the bear model.

I'm talking about how much is 1 hit rating worth compared to 1 strength, etc.

Odd. It's there, for me, very bottom. Anyone else missing it?

I did notice though, that I accidentally left the 'Hit Test' chart active. That'll be removed in the next version, to prevent confusion.
Sigh. I started Rawr today, and there it was. I could have sworn that it wasn't there before. I looked hard for it since I really wanted those numbers...

Ok, I think I've found out where I went wrong.

It seems the model is not saved with in the file, so when I load a new file I still have the old model. I suggest that is changed so that the model is saved per file.
Secondly, the tree model doesn't have any relative stats page, which is a bit sad. I suggest that is added.

So, combining these, I loaded a cat file, and forgot to change model. Then there wasn't a relative stats page.
